metadata.title: CVE-2024-35918 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:randomize_kstack: Improve entropy diffusion The kstack_offset variable wasreally only ever using the low bits for kernel stack offset entropy. Add aror32() to increase bit diffusion.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
